abstract: Analysts appear to have concluded that putting the two companies together poses at least some antitrust risk.
snippet: Analysts appear to have concluded that putting the two companies together poses at least some antitrust risk.
lead_paragraph: Could a merger of United Technologies and Honeywell — two huge industrial conglomerates that have flirted with combining in the past — ever happen?

headline.main: Honeywell and United Technologies Disagree on Merits of Merger
headline.print_headline: Honeywell and United Technologies Disagree on Merits of Merger

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
